chapter.text: You turn back to see where the red one once was and see the exit doors rattle, as if something is trying to get in.^1500 You begin to run.^250 You don’t look back.^250 You hear an overwhelming noise of what you can only assume to be the lockers attached to the opposite walls,^250 crashing together.^1500 You make your way to the gym and quickly close the doors behind you as two lockers crash directly in front of the steel doors.^1500 You’ll have to find another way out.
